about_the_game:
The Official Soundtrack for Rainswept, consisting of 28 tracks - 1 hour 36 minutes of original music from the game! The soundtrack has been composed by micamic (Michal Michalski) and includes tracks by Kitty and Sam Ray.

reviews:
“Rainswept is proof that micAmic’s growth continues with great promise, their compositions becoming more complex and nuanced when it comes to exploring psychologically dense stories.”
A Closer Listen

“Tracks mirror the heartbreak, loss and sadness of this game’s story. Mostly comprising of somber piano arrangements, low synths and soft violins, the score fits Rainswept perfectly, giving more life to the game’s voiceless narrative.”
Indie Game Reviewer
